<h3 id="X9785">X(9785)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES:  2ND CONWAY AND HUTSON-INTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (-a+b+c)*(a^3+3*(b+c)*a^2+3*(b-c)^2*a+(b-c)*(b^2-c^2)) : :
<p><b>
X(9785) = 8*R*X(1)-(4*R+r)*X(7)
</b></p>
<p>X(9785) lies on these lines: {1,7}, {2,1697}, {4,7320}, {8,210}, {10,5274}, {11,9710}, {12,9779}, {40,5435}, {55,404}, {56,9778}, {72,5809}, {144,6762}, {145,329}, {149,5175}, {165,5265}, {220,5838}, {355,1000}, {388,5919}, {392,5082}, {405,5766}, {496,5657}, {517,938}, {518,20016}, {519,5815}, {529,2098}, {946,5226}, {952,5811}, {999,6361}, {1125,5281}, {1191,5222}, {1219,3729}, {1420,3522}, {1482,3488}, {1616,4000}, {1699,5261}, {2136,3452}, {2269,5296}, {3085,6953}, {3086,5119}, {3090,7743}, {3091,9614}, {3146,9580}, {3149,3295}, {3189,5289}, {3303,3485}, {3304,3474}, {3361,5493}, {3434,3890}, {3476,6284}, {3487,6767}, {3528,5126}, {3543,9613}, {3601,3622}, {3617,9581}, {3621,5727}, {3623,5905}, {3625,8275}, {3649,8162}, {3680,5795}, {3832,9578}, {3895,5328}, {3913,8169}, {5048,5180}, {5129,9623}, {5218,5550}, {5225,5252}, {5250,5273}, {5584,7677}, {5759,8158}, {5818,9669}, {6260,7966}, {6735,6919}, {6736,8165}, {7673,7957}, {7676,8273}, {7679,7958}</p>
<p>
X(9785) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (8,2551), (938,1058), (3600,1)<br>
X(9785) = anticomplement of X(1706)<br>
X(9785) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,20,4308), (1,390,4313), (1,962,7), (1,1742,4322), (1,4294,5731), (1,4309,4305), (1,5731,6049), (1,9589,4298), (8,8055,341), (175,176,269), (390,4342,4345), (496,5657,5704), (497,3057,8), (950,7962,145), (2098,3058,3486), (2098,3486,3241), (2478,3885,8), (3295,5603,5703), (4313,4345,1), (4323,8236,1)<br>
</p>
